name: exphunter
title: Expansion Hunter by Illumina
summary: Genotype STRs for copy number in WGS aligned sequence reads

inputSpec.name: readfile
inputSpec.label: aligned sequence reads
inputSpec.help: WGS reads on which STR copy-number genotypes to be called

inputSpec.name: buildfile
inputSpec.label: genome reference build
inputSpec.help: reference build to which input reads are aligned: default set to DNANexus core hg38

inputSpec.name: varcatalog
inputSpec.label: STR variant metadata
inputSpec.help: metadata for defined STRs on which genotyping should be attempted, in Expansion Hunter Variant Catalog schema

inputSpec.name: outprefix
inputSpec.label: prefix for output files
inputSpec.help: string prefix to be used in output VCF and JSON filenames

inputSpec.name: mode
inputSpec.label: STR analysis mode
inputSpec.help: analysis mode to be applied in STR calling.  To run in 'seeking' mode, sequence reads must be pre-sorted

outputSpec.name: outvcf
outputSpec.label: STR copy number genotypes
outputSpec.help: copy number calls and metadata for available STRs in variant catalog.  Equivalent to output JSON

outputSpec.name: outjson
outputSpec.label: STR copy number genotypes
outputSpec.help: copy number calls and metadata for available STRs in variant catalog.  Equivalent to output VCF
